attributes.action: Vehicles of the same model type as historic tax exempt should also be tax exempt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vechicles of a type that are tax exempt should also be tax exempt ie:- where an MGB was first manufactured before 1973, and has not substantialy changed in its construction to such an extent, as to become a different vehicle, it should also be tax exempt,even if manufactured after that date,due to its initial design being prior to that, therefore making it an historic Vehicle by design.
